seo.title: Corniglia Hiking Trails 2025 | Best Hikes in Cinque Terre
seo.description: Explore hiking trails from Corniglia. Central location for all major trails, connections to Vernazza and Manarola, vineyard paths, and coastal views.

body.title: Perfect Hiking Base
body.subtitle: Central location connecting all major trails. Hike through vineyards, forests, and along spectacular coastal paths.

features.title: Corniglia to Vernazza
features.description: 2 hours, moderate. Classic SVA trail with stunning coastal views, vineyard terraces, and dramatic cliffs.

features.title: Corniglia to Manarola
features.description: 1.5 hours, moderate. High inland route through olive groves and vineyards with panoramic sea views.

features.title: Volastra Loop
features.description: 1 hour, easy. Circular route through the hillside village of Volastra. Wine tasting opportunities.

features.title: The Lardarina
features.description: 15 minutes, steep. Famous 382-step staircase connecting the train station to the village center.

features.title: Sanctuary Trail
features.description: 4 hours, challenging. High ridge trail connecting all five sanctuaries. Spectacular panoramic views.

features.title: Via dell'Amore (upper)
features.description: 2 hours, moderate. Alternative high route while lower Lovers Walk remains closed.

body.title: Start Your Cinque Terre Hiking Adventure
